entry.title: The Way He Looks At Me
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,338Chapters: 7/8Kudos: 46

Summary: Derek Hale doesn‚Äôt know how to let people stay. Trauma taught him that love is dangerous, that opening the door only leads to more loss. First Hannah, then Laura. He‚Äôs still reeling, still holding himself together with frayed edges and silence.Stiles Stilinski doesn‚Äôt care. He shows up anyway, armed with too many questions, stubborn loyalty, and a steady presence Derek doesn‚Äôt know how to turn away. Somewhere between holding Derek up and keeping him grounded, Stiles falls in love.This is the story of Derek learning that healing is possible, that love can be safe, and that sometimes survival isn‚Äôt enough. Sometimes, you get to have more. And that people should be held accountable for their actions.

Raised in secret by a lonely sheriff in the supernatural hotspot of Beacon Hills, the twins grow up hunting monsters, dodging Hydra, and accidentally joining a werewolf pack. At 18, Hydra resurfaces, Bucky gets pardoned, and suddenly the Avengers are knee-deep in werewolf drama, teen angst, and illegal cloning. Oh‚Äîand Stiles might be mated to a grumpy alpha named Derek Hale. Super soldiers, werewolves, and family reunions? Just another Tuesday in Beacon Hills.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,669Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 47

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power‚Äîand its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he‚Äôs determined to protect the Stilinski legacy‚Äîeven without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family‚Äîfeared for their near-feral strength‚Äîemerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox‚Äôs cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: Echoes of You (Traduccion de "Hasta Encontrarte")
entry.summary:
Author: ariadna19

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,242Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Beacon Hills was eerily silent.It wasn‚Äôt the kind of silence that comes before a storm, nor the hush of a forest at dusk. It was a void. As if something had been ripped out of the world‚Ä¶ and no one could remember what.Scott noticed it first. Lydia felt it in her bones. Malia smelt it in the air. But no one could name it. No one could say what was missing.Except Derek. From the moment he crossed the town‚Äôs border, he knew something essential was gone. He couldn‚Äôt explain it, couldn‚Äôt name it, but he felt it like an open wound. And he wouldn‚Äôt stop until he discovered what‚Äîor who‚Äîhad been erased from the world.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------üí≠What if the pack had called Derek during the Ghost Riders disaster in season 6A? entry.title: To Forge a Pack
entry.summary:
Author: Arieanna

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 195,173Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 840

Summary: Derek Hale now has the beginnings of the Hale Pack, brought together with the help of Spark Stiles Stilinski. They took down Gerard after all his wrongdoings, and now Derek is looking at strengthening his pack.But things are changing faster than he can control. He knows, now, that he has a chance with Stiles having come out to him, but does that mean that the other boys wants him? Is it even a chance he should take?Besides, romance should be the last thing on his mind, since he found evidence that the Alpha Pack have started to make a move.Picks up directly where To Build A Pack ends.
